summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1950, for the improvement of Thirty-first Avenue South, from Massachusetts Street to McClellan Street, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of side sewer connections, under Ordinance No. 20125, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
